name: Domino's Vice VR
description:
If you're looking for a casual VR game and want to take a breather from standing and jumping, Domino's Vice VR will have you Attentively playing, reading your opponents patterns, while feeling like you are at your tropical dream vacation.

Domino's Vice VR is an early access, fully functional domino game coded from scratch, with 3 different classic game-modes to chose from (draw, or block with either double 6 or 9). Currently it is only against CPU (with Beginner and Advanced Difficulties) but our plans are to include multiplayer 1v1 in the next Update and later include multiplayer Game-modes up to 4 players in future updates.
